venue.name: Riverview Restaurant at the Hudson Portuguese Club

item.description:
Correction, this event is not a free event.

The event is a Special Luncheon featuring Appetizers, Entree and Dessert Samples from our newly released cookbook.

The price is $23 per person includes recipes from the cookbook including Appetizer Tray, Choice of Cabra Chanfana, Bacalhau de Natas, Bife a Portuguese or Luisa's Chicken and Dessert.

I am looking forward to seeing you there.

Joana

_____________________________________________________


I know this is a little out of the way, however I think this will be such a nice social activity and a chance to sample Portuguese food and buy the recipes.
I am thinking this would be a great Christmas gift. I am planning to cross a few people off my list after this event.

I visited this club early this year and the grounds are beautiful. The landscaping is amazing. It is not only a Portuguese restaurant. In fact the restaurant is a very small part of this club. The grounds contains several function halls, a bar, a gym, outdoor patio, and even a shrine with a waterfall/river dedicated to the Lady of Fatima.

Just sign-up and I will take of the reservation with the club.


******************************************
Experience a "Taste of Hudson"

The Riverview HPC proudly presents a Special Luncheon featuring Appetizers, Entree and Dessert Samples from our newly released cookbook.

A Taste of Hudson, a collection of recipes from the Hudson, MA Community.

Cookbooks will be on sale for $20.00

[url= www.hudsonportugueseclub.org] www.hudsonportugueseclub.org http://www.riverviewh...[/url]

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Portuguese Cookbook Luncheon Event
